course_description: This course provides a historical overview of extracorporeal technology and principles of design and safety features of equipment and laboratory components. Emphasis is on simulated experiences with the varied components and extracorporeal techniques used to manage the total perfusion process.
prerequisites: CVP 565 or equivalent transfer credit as co-requisite. Students will have to enroll in CVP 565 first.
